desc: Australian owned Premium Weighted Blanket. Our weighted blankets are designed for sleep, anxiety and stress. Our blankets provides a calming sensation and are available in various weights, there is a weighted blanket for everyone. We stock cooling bamboo covers and warming faux mink covers.

layout.text: Put restless nights to bed and get the sleep you deserve.
Improve your sleep, reduce anxiousness and cuddle up to our weighted blankets today.
